title: Dependency Updates Triage & Sprint Planning
context: GitHub PR triage and sprint planning for 14 open dependency update PRs

high_priority_current_sprint.title: Critical Vercel Node.js Runtime Update
high_priority_current_sprint.risk: HIGH - Major version jump could break serverless functions
acceptance_criteria: Verify all API endpoints work after update (weather-locations, feedback, health)
Confirm no breaking changes in serverless function deployment
Resolve any conflicts between PR #238 and #223
Deploy to preview and validate functionality

high_priority_current_sprint.title: Frontend Build Tools Update
high_priority_current_sprint.description: Build tools group in /apps/web with 2 updates

stories.title: Testing Infrastructure Major Updates
stories.risk: HIGH - Major version changes in testing libraries

implementation_timeline.current_sprint: 4 bug fix stories focusing on infrastructure and immediate dependencies
implementation_timeline.next_sprint: Epic with 4 sub-stories for systematic major version updates

github_project_setup.manual_creation_required: GitHub token permissions prevent automated issue creation

key_insights: All 14 open PRs are Dependabot dependency updates
@vercel/node major version update is highest priority due to deployment infrastructure impact
5 major version updates require extensive testing
Batch approach needed to prevent PR backlog accumulation
